resources.string: Develop an application to share common places, the idea is that you can register and log in to the app, share places you\'ve met with other people, the app should have a feed where you can see the places that other people have posted.

We need you to grant us the location permits to register the places where you have a state and with that information show you who have been in that same place.
Your location will be saved every 30 minutes. If you want to stop the service, click here.
You still haven\'t save a place.
Your location will be saved every 30 minutes. So you have to granted the location permissions and ENABLE your GPS.
Accept, I will enable my gps.
